configuration.querysql: SELECT F.FND_LNG_DESCRIPTION ANNUITY_NAME, D.TRD_LNG_DESCRIPTION BANK, FEE1, FEE2, FEE3 FROM REF_FUND F, REF_TRD_MASTER_DATA D, (SELECT F.ID_FND_CODE, F.FND_LNG_DESCRIPTION, F.FND_CRITERIA_1, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT,0,4) = '2206' THEN (B.BKE_ACC_CREDIT_AMOUNT-B.BKE_ACC_DEBIT_AMOUNT) END),0) FEE1, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT,0,4) = '2207' THEN (B.BKE_ACC_CREDIT_AMOUNT-B.BKE_ACC_DEBIT_AMOUNT) END),0) FEE2, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT,0,4) = '2205' THEN (B.BKE_ACC_CREDIT_AMOUNT-B.BKE_ACC_DEBIT_AMOUNT) END),0) FEE3 FROM VWH_CF_HIS_BOOKING_ENTRY B, REF_FUND F WHERE B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNTING = F.ID_FND_CODE AND F.FND_END_VALIDITY = DATE '2199-12-31' AND $X{IN,F.ID_FND_CODE,fundsList} AND $X{IN,F.FND_CLASSIFICATION,CAMC_FundLevel} AND SUBSTR(B.ID_BKE_ACCOUNT,0,4) IN ('2205','2206','2207') AND B.ID_BKE_ACC_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR($P{valuationDate},'YYYY')||'-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND $P{valuationDate} GROUP BY F.ID_FND_CODE, F.FND_LNG_DESCRIPTION, F.FND_CRITERIA_1) M WHERE 1=1 AND $X{IN,F.ID_FND_CODE,fundsList} AND $X{IN,F.FND_CLASSIFICATION,CAMC_FundLevel} AND F.FND_END_VALIDITY = DATE '2199-12-31' AND F.ID_FND_CODE = M.ID_FND_CODE (+) AND 'OCR\DEPO\\' || F.FND_CRITERIA_1 = D.ID_TRD_TRANSLATION (+) --- 第三斜Q是自己加的 AND D.ID_TRD_LANGUE(+) = 'ZH' ORDER BY F.ID_FND_CODE
